reviewText: I, being an individual who learns different hand to hand  combat styles, was impressed with this dvd. Great DVD. I would recommend this to anyone interested in learning hand to hand combat.

This video takes you through the hand to hand combat system that was taught to marines about 10 years back. We do still teach these to Iraqi Police Force, and other foreign units. It's super easy to learn, but you'll need a partner, and with practice this will become automatic.
